title: IT-Consultant (m/f) Webmethods - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: Wien, W 1230
body:
The PRINZHORN Group, founded in 1853, is still a family owned and managed group with 9.800 employees in 16 countries, and a European market leader in the packaging, paper, and recycling industry. With an annual turnover of 1,90 billion Euro, the group ranks number three in Europe and plans to double its size by 2030.

In order to strengthen the group IT-Team at the location in Vienna 23, we are, effective immediately, looking for a

IT-Consultant (m/f)

WebMethods Integration Specialist

YOU WILL

MAIN TASKS
  • Design and Implementation of concepts for the Enterprise Application Integration
  • Evaluation and implementation of integration projects
  • Evaluate new components of webMethods and drive the internal optimization of the platform
  • Support and optimize existing interfaces and integration topics in webMethods

REQUIREMENTS

  • Technical IT-Education (HTL or college)
  • Experience in WebMethods (at least 2-3 years)
  • Professional practice as an integration expert in EAI in international companies
  • Knowledge of EDI formats (IDOC, EDIFACT, XML,…)
  • Experience with SAP, Oracle (Connector & Forms) and Webmethods-Certifications is beneficial
  • Self- dependent responsibility is the preferred work style
  • Balancing and consensus-oriented team player
  • Hands-on mentality and proactive work style
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Very good command of English, German is desirable
  • Work permit in Austria

WE WILL

WE OFFER YOU
  • Work as part of a dynamically growing and internationally operating group
  • Good work-life balance and quality working conditions
  • Attractive social benefits (staff canteen, employee parking, etc.)
  • Modern location in company headquarters in Vienna with excellent public transport connections (U6)
  • Start: immediately
  • Salary: Depending on your specific qualification and professional experience, we offer you an annual gross salary starting at € 60.000 (all-in-contract)

If this task intrigues you and you would like to take the opportunity to contribute with your expertise to a dynamic team, and you enjoy working internationally we look forward to receiving your application (please add project experience and your motivation of work).

Please submit your application at Nr. 79.123 under ISG-Karriereportal or by eMail.

Visit us at www.isg.com/jobs - here you find the actual joboffers
ISG Personalmanagement GmbH
A-2522 Oberwaltersdorf, Fabriksstraße 12/2/Top 12
Hans Georg Stadlober
M: +43 680 145 35 71, T: +43 2256 21111
@: bewerbung.stadlober@isg.com
BEWERBEN
